rnalysis.filtering.HTCountFilter.fold_changeÂ¶

HTCountFilter.fold_change(numerator, denominator, numer_name: str = 'default', denom_name: str = 'default')Â¶

Calculate the fold change between the numerator condition and the denominator condition, and return it as a FoldChangeFilter object.

Parameters

  • numerator (str, or list of strs) â the HTCountFilter columns to be used as the numerator. If multiple arguments are given in a list, they will be averaged.

  • denominator (str, or list of strs) â the HTCountFilter columns to be used as the denominator. If multiple arguments are given in a list, they will be averaged.

  • numer_name (str or 'default') â name to give the numerator condition. If âdefaultâ, the name will be generarated automatically from the names of numerator columns.

  • denom_name (str or 'default') â name to give the denominator condition. If âdefaultâ, the name will be generarated automatically from the names of denominator columns.

Return type

FoldChangeFilter

Returns

A new instance of FoldChangeFilter
